mapper.select: select REVIEW_NO as no, USER_NO as "user.no", RESTAURANT_NO as "restaurant.no", REVIEW_CONTENT as content, REVIEW_LIKE_COUNT as likeCount, REVIEW_CREATED_DATE as createdDate, REVIEW_UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate, REVIEW_IMAGE as image, REVIEW_POINT as point from REVIEW where ACCO_ID is NULL and REVIEW_DELETED = 'N' order by REVIEW_CREATED_DATE desc
